indvExpPatVisits Server Function

Source: R/mod_indvExpPatVisits.R
mod_indvExpPatVisits_server.Rd

Prepare Individual Explorer Tab's Visits subtab with content. Specifically, creating some headers, build events dataset, Output a DT & plotly Object.

mod_indvExpPatVisits_server(
  input,
  output,
  session,
  datafile,
  loaded_adams,
  usubjid,
  filtered_dat
)

Arguments

input, output, session

Internal parameters for shiny.
datafile

A list of dataframes
loaded_adams

A character vector of loaded adam datasets
usubjid

A Character string containing a USUBJID
filtered_dat

A IDEAFilter output data frame containing USUBJID

See also

Other indvExp Functions: build_events(), fnIndvExplVisits(), mod_indvExpPatEvents_server(), mod_indvExpPat_server(), mod_indvExp_server(), mod_indvExp_ui(), my_gg_color_hue(), org_df_events()
